urls.title: Notorious landfill rejects waste after pressure from EA
urls.description: The operator of a Staffordshire landfill site which has made national headlines over recent months for the distress it is causing residents, has rejected six separate waste loads in the last two weeks, after agreeing with the Environment Agency to check it was only accepting permitted waste.
